history.content: Founded in [YEAR], Uhakika Group has grown from a small startup to a leading ISP in the region. Our journey has been marked by continuous expansion, technological innovation, and unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction.

licenses.content: We are fully licensed by ARCT (Burundi) and hold certifications for network security. Our partnerships with major companies demonstrate our commitment to legitimate and professional business operations.

ceoMessage.content: At Uhakika Group, we are committed to connecting communities and empowering businesses through reliable internet services. Our vision is to be the trusted partner in your digital journey, providing solutions that grow with your needs.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide fast internet services, communication solutions for businesses and homes, along with modern network equipment that enables excellent and reliable services.

homeInternet.title: Home Internet
homeInternet.description: High-speed internet service for home use, studying, entertainment, and online work. Available via Fiber or Wireless technology depending on the area.

businessInternet.title: Business Internet
businessInternet.description: Reliable internet solutions for offices, companies, institutions, and businesses that require high uptime and specialized management.

fiberInstallation.title: Fiber Installation & Connectivity
fiberInstallation.description: High-quality fiber-optic connection installation with consistent speed and low latency. We perform installations for homes and companies.

dedicatedInternet.title: Dedicated Corporate Internet (DIA)
dedicatedInternet.description: Dedicated internet for institutions and large companies requiring non-shared connections (dedicated bandwidth), SLA, and 24/7 emergency support.

networking.title: Networking Solutions
networking.description: Installation of routers, switches, access points, CCTV connectivity, along with internal network design (LAN, WAN).

equipment.title: Equipment Sales
equipment.description: Sales of internet equipment such as WiFi routers, fiber routers, modems, access points, cables, and installation equipment.

ictSupport.title: ICT Support & Managed Services
ictSupport.description: System management services, troubleshooting, consultancy, maintenance, and technical support.
